mapper.insert: insert into ec_diff_cust (task_id, source_cust_no, target_cust_no, mark_user, mark_reason, mark_time, mark_conclusion, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat ) values (#{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceCustNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetCustNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{markUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{markReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysDate, #{markConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
